amendment.description: Page 47, after line 2, insert the following new section: ? SEC. 503. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for Southwest Gas Corporation GEDAC heat pump Development, NV.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available for the Southwest Gas Corporation GEDAC heat pump Development, NV.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.
